text: allāh kerehi manakkalpitava boru gotannan viniścaya dinaya gæna kumak nam sitannehuda? (eya boruvak yayi sitannehuda?) niyata vaśayenma allāh minisun kerehi imahat dayābaravantayeku vaśayen siṭinnēya. (nætahot ovunva evele evelēma dan̆ḍuvam kara ættēya). mesē tibiyadī ovungen bohomayak (ohuṭa) kṛtagna vannē næta
